title: Exquisite Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram
materials: Crafted in high-quality metal alloy with a radiant
Hyderabadi-inspired polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds
meticulously selected for their fire and clarity. Weights: G.wt:-134.560(GH)
features: A breathtaking cascade of floral motifs, this Haaram features five graduating strands of intricately set diamonds. Each floral element is meticulously crafted, creating a mesmerizing play of light and brilliance. The arrangement evokes traditional South Indian design principles while incorporating a modern, lightweight feel.
colors: Predominantly a dazzling white due to the diamonds
with the metal adding a subtle underlying shimmer.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivah)
and milestone celebrations. Its exquisite design also makes it suitable for important cultural events like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions.
description: This Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a statement of timeless elegance. Its design cleverly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary trends. The exquisite diamond setting and lightweight construction make it comfortable to wear for extended periods. A true heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
